name: Allergic Reactions
description:
Upkeep: Lose 1 Stamina if you are in a street area.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Agoraphobia Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Back Injury
description:
You cannot have a total of more than 3 Common items and Unique items.  If you ever have more than that, you must discard any extras.
If you ever gain another Back Injury card, you are devoured.

name: Blood Disease
description:
If you use 4 or more movement points in a single Movement Phase, lose 1 Stamina.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Addiction Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Broken Hand
description:
You have 1 fewer hand to use during combat.
If you ever gain another Broken Hand card, you are devoured.

name: Concussion
description:
You cannot adjust any of your skills by more than 1 stop per turn.
If you ever gain another Concussion card, you are devoured.

name: Consumption
description:
-1 Maximum Stamina
If you ever gain another Consumption card, you are devoured.

name: Cracked Ribs
description:
If you ever lose 3 or more Stamina at once (after any reductions), you are devoured
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Amnesia Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Disfiguring Scars
description:
Any time you fail a Sneak check (not including Evade checks) while in Arkham, raise the terror level by 1.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Xenophobia Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Dizzy Spells
description:
You are delayed each time you get no successes on any skill check made during an encounter (but not during combat caused by encounters).
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Claustrophobia Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Double Vision
description:
You may not pick up Clue tokens on the board, although you may still gain them by other means, such as through encounters and by defeating monsters.
If you ever gain another Double Vision card, you are devoured.

name: Feverish
description:
You cannot spend more than 2 Clue tokens on any skill check.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Paranoia Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Head Wound
description:
-1 Lore
You cannot spend more than 2 Clue tokens to add to any Lore check.
If you ever gain another Head Wound card, you are devoured.

name: Hearing Loss
description:
-1 Sneak
You cannot spend more than 2 Clue tokens to add to any Sneak check.
If you ever gain another Hearing Loss card, you are devoured.

name: Heart Damage
description:
Treat all monsters you combat as having the Overwhelming 1 ability (or, if the monster already has the Overwhelming ability, add one to its current Overwhelming ability).
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Delirium Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Infected Wound
description:
When you gain Stamina, you gain 1 less point of Stamina (to a minimum of 0). Disregard this when you are knocked unconscious and are restored to 1 Stamina.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Necrophobia Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Injured Arm
description:
-1 Fight
You cannot spend more than 2 Clue tokens to add to any Fight check.
If you ever gain another Injured Arm card, you are devoured.

name: Jinxed
description:
-1 Luck
You cannot spend more than 2 Clue tokens to add to any Luck check.
If you ever gain another Jinxed card, you are devoured.

name: Memory Loss
description:
You cannot have a total of more than 3 Skills and Spells (added together).  If you ever have more than that, you must discard any extras.
If you ever gain another Memory Loss card, you are devoured.

name: Nerve Damage
description:
Anytime you lose Stamina (even if the loss is reduced to 0), the amount of Stamina lost is increased by 1.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Depression Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Respiratory Ailment
description:
After each skill check, lose an amount of Stamina equal to the number of Clue tokens you spent during the check.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Hysteria Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Seizures
description:
Anytime you lose Sanity (even if the loss is reduced to 0), lose 1 Stamina.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Mania Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Skin Rash
description:
Anytime you lose Stamina (even if the loss is reduced to 0), lose 1 Sanity.
Treat this card as a duplicate of the Schizophrenia Madness card for purposes of being devoured.

name: Sprained Ankle
description:
-1 Speed
You cannot spend more than 2 Clue tokens to add to any Speed check.
If you ever gain another Sprained Ankle card, you are devoured.

name: Tainted
description:
-1 Will
You cannot spend more than 2 Clue tokens to add to any Will check.
If you ever gain another Tainted card, you are devoured.
